articles.title: Asian Development Bank to stop financing coal plants - CGTN
articles.description: The Asian Development Bank (ADB) will stop financing new coal power plants under a draft energy policy released Friday.
articles.content:
The Asian Development Bank (ADB) will stop financing new coal power plants under a draft energy policy released Friday, a move that was cautiously welcomed by environmental groups.

articles.title: As West opens up, Asia’s ‘zero-Covid’ economies face hermit risk - South China Morning Post
articles.description: In a world where Covid-19 becomes endemic, economies reliant on sealed borders to keep the virus at bay will have painted themselves into a corner, experts say.
